content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5).
- The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.
- The boiler is operational with a full output status.
- The offshore pump is working and providing water.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0).
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5).

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of a lab (position 0, 0) that is currently not powered and has no ingredients for research.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to remove electric poles
- Ensure the electric pole you are trying to remove exists at the specified position before attempting to pick it up.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all power-consuming entities are properly connected to a power network to avoid operational issues.
